entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as having a curly pig's tail poking out of his trousers after an encounter with a wizard.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as not eating anything and seeming to be biting back a furious diatribe she wants to throw at Harry.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as barking across the table about people driving.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being the target of Aunt Petunia's furious diatribe.

entities.name: london
entities.description: London is mentioned as the location where Dudley had to pay for his curly pig's tail removal at a private hospital.

relationships.description: Aunt Petunia seems to be biting back a furious diatribe she wants to throw at Harry.
Uncle Vernon is barking across the table about people driving.
